name: Tumbleweed (itch)
description:
Simple 2D platform game. Where you are tumbleweed . You have travel/blown across Texas.

The game was original designed in  Sept 2013- Nov 2014.

---------Directions How to Play----------------

Use Right and Left Arrow to move forward.

Use Space bar to Jump.

----------------------------------------------------

The File is Zip

Game Designed by Knut LSG Hybinette and Megan Ehrhart

Note: The game was $1,000,000,00 but only can set $99,999.99.
So, this game is a bargain.
